title: [CLIENT] Kindreds icon i so messed up XD
body:
**Just fix kindreds base icon **and her **litle icon plz** its just **so wrong  in the client right now**
**her spalsh is SOOOOOOO zoomed in and her portrait isnt even visible** and** tomorrow** its her release** plz fix this in the upcoming patch !!!!!!!!!!!!**

replies.body:
Hey sonicpratt,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and Kindred will be fixed up before their debut!
Well **you fixed it so good job** _thanks for noticing this_ :D
